body:
Hello Avicus Network!
I am going to create a podcast and I need a Co-Host a dedicated one and some guests to you know just come on and talk for about a hour or two about anything really. I was thinking that this podcast could tie in with Avicus but probably won't unless asked. So it will be entitled the shadowCast.

The date and time for the podcast will be a set time and date still awaiting to set but if you want to join message me somehow but I am hoping that the podcast will start in a week or two.

Tell me your thoughts and what you think about it :)

title: Podcast Announcement

replies.body: Sounds good. I'd be happy to be a guest a couple of times
replies.body_tagged: Sounds good. I'd be happy to be a guest a couple of times

replies.body:
I'm so keen to be a guest!
Just waiting on those times because my schedule changes all the time :P

replies.body: Okay Spookeh and Snow I sent you a contact request on Skype we probs won't be using Skype probably my Private TeamSpeak Channel.
